coded_answer.p: I hadhave received your letter,. I am very happy to have won the first priceprize.
I would like to go in July after taking my examination at the college inat the end of June. So it is impossible for me to go beforeearlier.
I would prefer to stay in a tent to staying in a cabin. Because it is something I feel moresmore familiafamiliar with. I used to go camping with my family every summer.

I am quite good at swimming. I won the first priceprize at the Regional Championship six years ago. But I think I'd rather do other activities whatwhich you show melist in your letter, like tennis. I have been playing this game with my friends and I like it.

I would be pleasepleased if you could give me some more information about the accommodation, and some advicesadvice about the clothclothing (shal) I should wear and how much money I should take with me.
Shopping is not always enjoyable,. It's even nonot even healthy for your pockets.
I just wonder how much time we spend shopping at the supermarket or how much time we spend buying clothsclothes.
Me, for example, I don't particularly like shopping, when. When I go on my own, it can be boredboring.
My sister loves shopping, she. She could stay trying clothes on all day in a shopin a shop all day trying on clothes.
I am agree that the most of the people enjoy buying clothsclothes, food, something for the house, presents etc. Because it is something itthat goes with their culture.

SometimeSometimes you can stay all day outout all day just to buy a present for someone, it. It stardstartstarts in the morning, and of course you have the breakfast somewhere, and it getgets later and you are still looking for it, so you have the lunch, soand finalyfinally you spentspend more money than you thought you would.
